synopsis: Ryo-san has dreams of becoming a famous musician, but the only way he can legally do so is to be approved by the government... at least not until Sensei and Cindy come along.

title.jp: Top Idol! Rampage at a Concert!

synopsis: Ryo-san, Sensei, and Cindy landed the incredible opportunity to show their passion for rock! Although they are breaking the law, they are fighting for the freedom to rock!
The musical trio decide to get one step closer to the lime light, in a literal sense, by taking work at a concert venue. Possibly falling victim of the brainwashing powers of Heaven's Song...

title.jp: Bath Concert! Let's Get Passionate Naked!

synopsis: After being banned from every concert venue around due to stricter enforcement of the law, the trio has to think outside the box and find a new way to rock!

title.jp: Peace Soul! Heaven's Song is Wild!

synopsis: A new song has been permitted by the government, but can the people handle the intensity behind the music or will they succumb to the hypnotic tune?

title.jp: Royal Concert! Rockers' Hearts are Moved to Tears!

synopsis: The government has its eye on the band, but it is soon discovered that they aren't the only special ones with Peace Souls. Can the Ultra Soul be stopped or will they unite?
Kondo's death has united the peace souls and with this unity they may just have the power necessary to defeat Heaven's Song and the evil Li! Does this group have the power needed?
A new all girl musical group is in town on a mission, but when the two groups meet their mission takes an interesting twist. Will rock be able to survive after these two groups collide?

title.jp: Mask the Rocker! The Soul is Important!

synopsis: The opportunity for a new idol has arose and the Ultra Soul is the perfect fit, but will the group be selling out if they accept this offer? With peace in their souls their problems will be answered!

title.jp: Solo Debut! We Can't Play Together Anymore!

synopsis: The government may have truly bullied rockers to the point of no return, ripping families apart and torturing anyone that comes near rock. Will the Ultra Souls be strong enough to stop it?

title.jp: Heaven's Song! Time for the Climax!

synopsis: Takasugi desires to get a job at the government so he can break it down from the inside. In order to do this, he must leave the band to fulfill his dreams.

title.jp: Ultra Soul! The Dawn of Rock!

synopsis: Heaven's Song is used by Yoshinobu to destroy Edo. It turns out that boredom leads to mischief as Yoshinobu tries hard to reveal Ultra Soul.
